summary: This document is an email chain from August 10-11, 2019, containing a report from a corrections staff member (likely from MCC New York) regarding a visit with inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). The report describes Epstein's condition, requests, and planned meeting with his attorneys shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as an inmate in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York, interacting with a cell mate, making requests, and planning to meet with his attorneys.

events.title: SHU Visit with Epstein
events.description: A corrections staff member visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). Epstein was preparing to meet with his attorneys, had a cell mate, denied any suicidal thoughts, and made various requests (social calls, a book).

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was visited in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York on Thursday, August 8, 2019.
Epstein had a cell mate at the time of the visit and was observed interacting with them.
Epstein explicitly denied any suicidal thoughts or intentions and showed no signs of distress, anxiety, or depression during the visit.
He was actively making requests (e.g., social calls without speaker phone, retrieval of a book) and planning to work on his legal case with his attorneys.
The document is dated August 10-11, 2019, which is immediately prior to Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
